content: Do not do unto others that, which you would dislike to be done unto you.
One drop of good behaviour is better than the ocean of principles, advises and decisions.
Remember that you are not small. You are pure and light. Will you not behave in accordance with your nature ?
The test of anybody's greatness is what he thinks and does for one who is lower than him.
It is possible to reform a person not by ridicule but by giving him an opportunity to think afresh and change himself.
